price: គេ(ហ្វៀរអោន)បានឆ្លើយថាៈ ពិតជាមាន. ហើយពិត ប្រាកដណាស់ ពួកអ្នកនឹងស្ថិតក្នុងចំណោមអ្នកជំនិត(របស់យើង)។
arabic: قَالَ نَعَمۡ وَإِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّمِنَ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: qāla naʿam wa-innakum idhan lamina al-muqarabīna
translations: the ones who are brought near
